name: Paul Goldsmith-Pinkham
body:
### Updates:
I have just taken a position as a research economist at the Federal Reserve Bank of New York. If you need to reach me, please email me at paulgp at gmail dot com. 

### Recent Papers Updated:
[Consumer Bankruptcy and Financial Health](http://www.nber.org/papers/w21032) with Will Dobbie and Crystal Yang
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
